Supports using the following Chinese variables: 【Merchant name】, 【Item name】, 【Currency type】, 【Amount】, 【Category】, 【Book】, 【Source】, 【Original asset】, 【Channel】
Detected that the category used when saving the bill is inconsistent with the category identified by the automatic accounting rule. Would you like to generate a new category rule?
The replacement content on both sides must not be empty.
No update needed. Long press to force update.

Irreversible operation, only use when uninstalling auto accounting.

Show notification after successfully loading auto accounting
Configure AI model and API settings
AI connection successful! The model is working properly.
Please configure provider, model and API key first
Use WebDAV instead of local backup
When enabled, auto backup will use WebDAV instead of local storage
Please configure WebDAV host, username and password first
Create backup and upload to WebDAV server
Download and restore the latest backup from WebDAV server
Are you sure you want to split this order from the current order into an independent order?
Accounting app cannot handle unrecognized assets, please map the following assets to ensure correct asset names.
Show a popup when a duplicate bill is detected
Choose the extraction method that best fits your device setup.

No root needed. Injects hooks by repackaging the target app (patching its APK), enabling deep integration similar to Xposed with better deployability on non-root devices. Requires reinstalling patched apps.
Root + LSPosed required. Hooks directly into app APIs and notifications for real-time, high-accuracy data capture—ideal for power users or enterprise environments with full device control.
No root needed. Captures screenshots or notifications and runs OCR/AI to extract bill details—easy to deploy on any device, perfect for everyday users and broad-compatibility scenarios.
To extract bill data, please grant the following permissions:
Allows the app to read incoming notifications to capture bill alerts.
Allows the app to read incoming notifications to capture bill alerts. This is optional for OCR mode.
Allows the app to read SMS messages for payment confirmation codes.
Allows the app to read SMS messages for payment confirmation codes. This is optional for OCR mode.
Allows displaying floating windows for quick extraction tools.
Allows the app to access the Internet for AI analysis and data synchronization.
Please open LSPosed Manager, go to Modules > Auto Accounting, enable the toggle, and then reboot your device to complete activation.
Open LSPosed Manager, enable the module, and then return here.
To ensure continuous background operation, please configure these settings:
Allow the app to run unrestricted when the device is idle or the screen is off.
Permit the app to launch automatically after device reboot.
Exclude the app from task cleaners to prevent it from being killed.
Some required permissions are still missing. Please grant them before continuing.
%d optional permissions not granted, may affect some features
Grant root (su) or Shizuku permission so the app can execute shell commands (e.g., screenshot). If Shizuku output fails on some MediaTek devices, try version 3.5.x.
Unable to open the battery‑optimization settings. Please add the app to the whitelist manually.
Locate the "Auto‑start" (or "Startup management") screen and allow this app to start automatically.
Unable to open the auto‑start settings. Please configure it manually.
Open the recent‑apps screen, then pull down or long‑press this app\'s card and choose "Lock" to keep it running.
Find this app in the list and switch it to "Don't optimise".
Tap "Battery optimisation" → "Don't optimise" on the next screen.
Battery optimisation is already disabled for this app.
Auto Accounting does not include data visualization features by default; you need to select one to serve as your data visualization analysis tool.
AutoAccounting needs access to the target app\'s categories, assets, and ledgers in order to record transactions correctly.

Tick the features you want to use in your ledger. Be sure to enable the same feature inside the corresponding app as well—otherwise it won\'t take effect. Features an app doesn\'t support are hidden automatically.
Track changes to bank cards, cash, funds, and other assets
Manage personal, family, or project books side by side
Centralise and follow your reimbursement workflow
Borrowing / lending, instalments, and repayment reminders
Capture fees, vouchers, and discounts automatically
Accounts and auto-conversion in multiple currencies
Configure your preferred AI service, model, and API token
Everything is ready. Let\'s get started.
Target app "%1$s" not installed, unable to proceed
Root is not granted or Shizuku is not running
Allow the app to send notifications to keep the foreground service running.
Use the pure black theme if dark theme is enabled

Display income with up arrow and expense with down arrow

This operation will clear all existing tags and restore the default tags. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
This will clear all categories for the current book and restore the default categories. This action cannot be undone. Continue?
Automatically check for accounting rule updates

You are currently using a Canary version with the following characteristics:

• Built automatically every 3 hours
• Contains latest features and fixes
• No guarantee of stability and availability
• May contain unknown bugs

Recommendations:
• Use with caution in production environments
• Please enable debug mode before reporting bugs
• Back up important data promptly

This whitelist applies to notifications and OCR data. It filters out apps you do not want to capture from. Manual OCR (started by you) is not affected by this whitelist.
